trait.name: Nimble Escape
trait.text: Krenko can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of his turns.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: Krenko makes two attacks with his scimitar.

action.name: Scimitar
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage plus 2 (1d4) poison damage..

action.name: Light Crossbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Redirect Attack
reaction.text: When a creature Krenko can see targets him with an attack, Krenko chooses another goblin within 5 feet of him. The two goblins swap places, and the chosen goblin becomes the target instead.

monster.name: Loading Rig
monster.conditionImmune: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

trait.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
trait.text: The rig is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the rig must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.

trait.name: Unstable
trait.text: If the rig takes damage, it must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or be incapacitated with a speed of 0 until a creature activates it with a successful DC 10 Intelligence (Arcana) check made as an action.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The armor makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Slam
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.
